comments:
build I20060214-0800

- new plug-in project
- don't select any template
- double-click on Manifest.mf file
- switch to Extensions tab
- add an org.eclipse.ui.editors extension
- get the following error:

Fixed.

This was caused by a leaky listener.
an extra listener to the bundle model in the PluginGeneralInfoSection was not being disposed of in the dispose() method.
